I've said this on the message board already:

First, Legacy dumps his poison.  Second,  Time shifts backwards and 
puts everyone in different spots with slightly altered histories as a 
means of correction itself.  Occasionally memories of the first time 
around pop up causing confusion, and helping one faction or another.  
What do you think?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> My appologies, Narrator, I actually missed your original post.
> 
> I find that Neo Beast Wars has been dragged on for too long, and the 
> world is becoming clogged with bases among other things. Ideas are 
> becoming exausted, if not completely exausted already. It seems to 
> me that we are almost delaying the end of the rpg. If you've created 
> one storyline that you like, is it not fair to say that you can 
> create another better one?
> 
> The idea of creating a sequel to the rpg is one that I would agree 
> with. That would require several things to happen:
> 1) Changing the name of the RPG.
> 2) Appropriate changes to the website.
> 3) A means to store all of everyone's previous characters (don't 
> know about everyone else, but I don't want to lose the bio's of all 
> my characters).
> 4) New story (i have an idea, not necessarily for the story, but for 
> how we could create the story).
> 5) A catalyst to start us all off (the story should provide that).
> 6) Implementation of new rules, some of which have been, and are 
> being, discussed in the login messageboard.
> 7) other stuff that could be written if I wasn't so tired.
> 
> All in all, since there are more people voting anti-restart that I'd 
> anticpated, I'll ask everyone a perhaps fate deciding question:
> 
> Would it be favourable to have a sequel instead of a restart?
>  
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > I'm agree with Soulstice, restart isn't good idea. All have good 
> > story-lines and good characters. Perhaps the best would be 
> eliminate  
> > less importat characters of our story-line (every rpgers could 
> choice 
> > at whom wants eliminate) and elimitante factions where are member 
> > that aren't posting and join factions that have few characters 
> > playing. 
> > 
> > That other way than restart.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > OOC: I at first wasn't sure if I could vote in this one. Not 
> only 
> > am I seemingly not too much an important part of this RPG, despite 
> > the general current lack of members, and the fact that I've been 
> here 
> > for getting close to 2 years, but also I am not involved in this 
> > restart. I have very few characters. Characters that, if the RPG 
> is 
> > restarted, will still be together (Insecticons, specifically), and 
> > therefore it wouldn't harm me to vote yes. However, I don't think 
> I 
> > could vote yes, because I am apposed to restarting the RPG. I have 
> > decided to vote no. It just doesn't make sense to me to end the 
> saga 
> > of Neo Beast Wars. It's a great saga that we've worked hard over 
> the 
> > years to keep going. I don't think that we could suddenly pretend 
> it 
> > never happened, I think it's impossible. Maybe if we ended it and 
> > started the sequel, I wouldn't mind so much, but otherwise, my 
> vote 
> > is no. Thank you for reading this if you even did...
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > >
